item.title: 404 Error Pages, One More Time
item.description: Smashing Magazine expound upon what makes a well designed 404 page in their latest design gallery which features 50 examples. Inspired by the gallery, I made a more useful 404 for Konigi as well. http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2009/01/29/404-error-pages-one-more-time/
